album.title: The Boy Who Knew Too Much

track.name: By the Time
comments: They were made to sing this song! :) <3
This is my favorite Mika song! Love it but what the heck did they do to it. The guy in the background saying mika the boy who knew to much out monday etc... is annoying. Why ruin the song like that?
What kind of sorcery is this? So touching.
My favorite Mika song! Beautiful and sad
Oh god this song gives me chills. Imogen Heap + Mika = Perfection
What's with the announcements in the middle?
ha, I also just had a tehblizz moment--had a feeling it was Imogean!
I love this song.. I remember when I first heard it, I didn't know Imogen Heap sang in it too x) I thought they just had identical voices. Then I dound out and was like "AAAA OMG"
As soon as it began, I was like Imogen, is that you?
By the first listen I thought the sound was ripped off Imogen... Now I know that it's her indeed XD Fantastic song by the way, I love when good artists collaborate
hah I knew it was her! Awesome song, I love Imogen Heap
Came her to assure myself it was indeed Imogen. :3 Two lovely artists collaborating!
